data.text:
Sitamarhi, Bihar, India

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 26.587299, 85.501183.

Sitamarhi is a large city in the state of Bihar, northern India, an important industrial and transportation center in the northern part of the country. The population of the town is close to 220,000 people, and Sitamarhi is a commercial spot, with a large railway station, as well as plenty of industrial zones and warehousing facilities. Since the border with Nepal is located nearby, the city plays an important role as import/export distribution center.
